buildCommand: if [ -f frontend/package.json ]; then npm --prefix frontend run build; else npm run build; fi
installCommand: export HOME=/root CARGO_HOME=/root/.cargo RUSTUP_HOME=/root/.rustup NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false; curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh -s -- -y; . /root/.cargo/env; CORE_DIR=; if [ -d shogi-core ]; then CORE_DIR=shogi-core; elif [ -d ../shogi-core ]; then CORE_DIR=../shogi-core; fi; (cd $CORE_DIR && npx --yes wasm-pack build --release); if [ -f frontend/package.json ]; then npm --prefix frontend ci --include=dev || npm --prefix frontend install --include=dev; else npm ci --include=dev || npm install --include=dev; fi
